_meta.description: SMS notification sent to teacher about unable to locate outcome
_meta.trigger: Report marked as unable to locate
_meta.assumption: SMS template for unable to locate notification

value.message: Update on your stray dog report (Tracking ID: ABC12345): Our team visited the location but could not locate the dog. The report has been closed. No payout will be issued for this report. Thank you for your vigilance.

noPayout._comment: Unable to locate = terminal state with no payout
noPayout.reason: Dog not found at reported location
